column1: Art Institute of Chicago////The ambiance of the place is very soothing and I love spending time here
column2: even if it's just sitting on a bench examining one piece in particular (...and since I'm usually there after work and in heels
column3: you better believe there is a lot of bench sitting). The Institute is a school as well so there are always art students doing studies
column4: and every time I see their talent I get a little jealous. But overall
column5: great place for any art lover and the employees are really nice
column6: too. If I move into the city itself one day
column7: I'll most definitely get a membership.
